publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3218 Mr Lloyd Quinan: Detention of Marwan Al Barghouti-That the Parliament condemns the continued detention without trial of the Palestinian parliamentarian Marwan Al Barghouti by the Government of Israel and calls upon Her Majesty's Government to use all its efforts to secure his release.
S1M-3218 Detention of Marwan Al Barghouti (lodged on 14 June 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-3218 Detention of Marwan Al Barghouti (lodged on 14 June 2002) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3218 Detention of Marwan Al Barghouti (lodged on 14 June 2002) Linda Fabiani*
